name: Langley Porter Psychiatric Hospital and Clinics
description: Consists of an adult inpatient unit, an adult Partial Hospitalization Program, and adult/child. Primary diagnoses for patients in all services include major depression, anxiety, and psychosis. LPPHC serves all ethnic and socio-economic groups who reside in San Francisco and the greater Bay Area.
